name: Angular - Constant Module
description: This will create an angular constant module.

name: Angular - Constant
description: This will create an angular constant to be used in the module.

name: Angular - Data Service
description: This will create a dataservice with all the promise set up build in.

name: Angular - Function Interface
description: This will create a function name and function to be added to a list of functions in an interface.

name: Angular - Http Function
description: This will create a function to be used in an angular module that will use Http to get results and has a complete callback function as well, could be used in conjunction with the interface.

name: Angular - Controller
description: This will create a controller and hook it up to the Angular App.

name: Angular - Dependency
description: This will create a dependency attached to the controller for dependency injection.

name: Angular - Controller
description: This will create a controller.

name: Angular - Controller Scope
description: This will create the scope that goes into the controller with the option to set one variable name and value.

name: Angular - Controller Scope Variable
description: This will create the scope variable that goes into the controller with the option to set one variable name and value.

name: Angular - Factory
description: This will create a factory module.

name: Angular - Module
description: This will create an angular module.

name: Angular - Module With Controller
description: This will create an angular module with a controller and injected data service.

name: Angular - Validator
description: This will create an angular validation directive.

name: Angular - Route Module
description: This will create an angular route module.

name: Angular Html - App
description: This will create an html tag with the angular app configuration.

name: Angular Html - Image
description: This will create an image tag with angular binders.

name: Angular Html - Repeater Table
description: This will create a table with an angular repeater in it.

name: Angular Html - Include
description: This will create an angular include wrapped in a div.

name: Angular Html - Get
description: This will create an angular get function that will return the results returned by the http get.

name: Angular Html - Post
description: This will create an angular post function that will return the results returned by the http post.

name: Angular Html - JsonP
description: This will create an angular JSONP function that will return the results returned by the http get.
